oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FACILITY: Experimental Farm Vredepeel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Vegetables
Root crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beside an integrated farm system the unit has an organic farm system (4 ha) representing the organic arable farms in the south-east of The Netherlands with vegetables for industrial processing.
